actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Market Transition Act to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from including any storage charges in the calculation of loan deficiency payments or loans made to producers for loan commodities.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Market Transition Act to prohibit inclusion of storage charges in calculating loan deficiency payments or loans made to producers for loan commodities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Market Transition Act to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from including any storage charges in the calculation of loan deficiency payments or loans made to producers for loan commodities.
